item.content:
Despina Chatzidimitraki Professional Make-up Artist

Despina Chatzidimitraki has been a Professional Make-up Artist for the past 19 years, with experience satisfying a diverse range of clients. Despina studied make-up at the International Make-Up Artists Dominique Des Vosgues in Paris. She has worked with top names in the fashion industry, in music, video, T.V., movies and is known for her natural yet beautiful work.
